channel.title: How to interact with client.java from an other file?
channel.description:
Hi, I'm making so when you run, you get agility xp every percantage, but i dont know how to get player.java in contact with client.java i've tried like "server.clientHandler.addskillxp(...." but it didnt work and i also tried some other ways.
Does anybody know how should i do this?

item.title: How to interact with client.java from an other file?
item.dc:creator: @1337_king 1337 king
item.description:
@1337_king wrote:

[quote=“analrape, post:6, topic:75665”]For example wehn i put this into PLAYER.JAVA

	public int sexyness = 0;

and after that i put this into CLIENT.JAVA

public void im2sexy(){ sexyness += 1; }

i wont get any errors,tough i didnt declare public int sexyness in CLIENT.JAVA tough it can read what i told the server to because PLAYER.JAVA interacts whit CLIENT.JAVA

so it bassecly doesnt matter if playerenergy -= 1; is in PLAYER.JAVA the CLIENT.JAVA knows it is so it can read it anyway.

so just add the addxp code u want in PLAYER.JAVA under the playerenergy -=1[/quote]Okay, it may be working for you, but not for me, because I’VE TRIED THAT! And it said cannot find symbol addxp!

Read full topic
item.source: How to interact with client.java from an other file?

item.title: How to interact with client.java from an other file?
item.dc:creator: @analrape analrape
item.description:
@analrape wrote:

For example wehn i put this into PLAYER.JAVA

	public int sexyness = 0;

and after that i put this into CLIENT.JAVA

public void im2sexy(){ sexyness += 1; }

i wont get any errors,tough i didnt declare public int sexyness in CLIENT.JAVA tough it can read what i told the server to because PLAYER.JAVA interacts whit CLIENT.JAVA

so it bassecly doesnt matter if playerenergy -= 1; is in PLAYER.JAVA the CLIENT.JAVA knows it is so it can read it anyway.

so just add the addxp code u want in PLAYER.JAVA under the playerenergy -=1

Read full topic
item.source: How to interact with client.java from an other file?

item.title: How to interact with client.java from an other file?
item.dc:creator: @1337_king 1337 king
item.description:
@1337_king wrote:

[quote=“analrape, post:4, topic:75665”]like i said itdoesnt matter where playerenergy is in player.java everything is linked to client.java just try it add a public int into player.java then declare a void using that int from player.java u wont get any errors.[/quote]I dont really understand that… can you write an example?

Read full topic

item.title: How to interact with client.java from an other file?
item.dc:creator: @analrape analrape
item.description:
@analrape wrote:

like i said itdoesnt matter where playerenergy is in player.java everything is linked to client.java just try it add a public int into player.java then declare a void using that int from player.java u wont get any errors.

item.title: How to interact with client.java from an other file?
item.dc:creator: @1337_king 1337 king
item.description:
@1337_king wrote:

[quote=“analrape, post:2, topic:75665”]that stuff doesnt have to go via player.java it can be done fine in client.java also player.java is already linked to client.java[/quote]No, because when i’ve tried to not-put there the server.clientHandler before it, it said cannot find symbol. and i can only do it in player.java, because there is the “playerEnergy -= 1;” code.

Read full topic
